attributes.action: For all current Members of Parliament to resign their posts.
attributes.background:
Due to their inability to agree a solution for the UK to leave the European Union for their own political reasons.
The referendum result in June 2016 was that the UK would leave the European Union. In the last thirty months nothing has been done to allow this to happen.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for someone to be given or lose their job. 

In any case, resignation would a personal decision for the MP concerned and not the UK Government or Parliament.
